creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has red ground with gold fingerprints and gold flame-like shapes; bottom sheet has turquoise and black ground with black and white linear coil designs and three solid iridescent bronze curls
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and Chop

on back at bottom edge, in pencil: [in step out of step VII AP 5/ 8/ 1997/ Steven Sorman] and [TANDEM PRESS: 5597-478]; on back, LLC: publisher\'s chop
title: In Step Out of Step VII
